places.name: Vicente López Ecological Reserve
places.description: A protected natural area of 2 hectares that is home to native flora and fauna. It offers trails for walking and is perfect for birdwatching and environmental education.
places.address: Paraná 4516, Vicente López, Buenos Aires, Argentina

places.name: Paseo de la Costa
places.description: A beautiful coastal park along the Río de la Plata, ideal for walking, biking, and enjoying green spaces. It features an artisan market and various sports facilities.
places.address: Av. Raúl Alfonsín y Laprida, Vicente López, Buenos Aires, Argentina

places.name: Quinta Trabucco
places.description: A historic mansion surrounded by large gardens, now used as a cultural center hosting exhibitions and events. It’s a great place to enjoy cultural activities in a natural setting.
places.address: Carlos F. Melo 3050, Florida, Buenos Aires, Argentina

places.name: Ader Tower
places.description: A distinctive architectural tower offering panoramic views of the city. It is a historic monument and an emblematic symbol of Vicente López.
places.address: Triunvirato 3400, Villa Adelina, Buenos Aires, Argentina

places.name: Lumiton Museum
places.description: Located in the former Lumiton film studios, this museum provides an insight into Argentine cinema history. It is a cultural space that preserves the memory of national filmmaking.
places.address: Sargento Cabral 2354, Munro, Buenos Aires, Argentina

places.name: Parish of Jesus in the Garden of Olives
places.description: A church of great architectural and spiritual value, known for its design and relevance in the local community. It is a point of interest for those who appreciate religious architecture.
places.address: Av. Maipú 2262, Olivos, Buenos Aires, Argentina

places.name: End of the Millennium Monument
places.description: An emblematic sculpture located at Paseo de la Costa, symbolizing the transition to the new millennium and serving as a landmark in the coastal area.
places.address: Av. Raúl Alfonsín y Gral. Roca, Vicente López, Buenos Aires, Argentina

places.name: Vicente López y Planes Square
places.description: A central square with green areas, children's playgrounds, and recreational spaces, ideal for enjoying outdoor moments with family or friends.
places.address: Ricardo Gutiérrez y Av. Maipú, Vicente López, Buenos Aires, Argentina
